rows.label: tlk43700149_02_msg0002
rows.name:
You probably already know
this, but different classes give
different benefits.

rows.label: tlk43700149_02_msg0003
rows.name:
It can affect your attack, defense...
even your recovery abilities.

rows.label: tlk43700149_02_msg0004
rows.name:
Make sure to bring plenty of Blades
along with you and find the class that
suits you best.
